microservices.name: add_two
microservices.doc:
Adds two to a number

Args:
    number (int): number to add two to

Returns:
    int: original input number plus two
microservices.code:
def add_two(number: int):
    """Adds two to a number

    Args:
        number (int): number to add two to

    Returns:
        int: original input number plus two
    """

    return number + 2

microservices.name: add_x
microservices.doc:
Adds x to a number

Args:
    number (int): number to add x to
    x (int): number to add to number

Returns:
    int: original input number plus x
microservices.code:
def add_x(number, x):
    """Adds x to a number

    Args:
        number (int): number to add x to
        x (int): number to add to number

    Returns:
        int: original input number plus x
    """

    return number + x

microservices.name: print_hello_world
microservices.code:
def print_hello_world():
    """Prints hello world to stdout
    """

    print("Hello world")

microservices.name: print_numpy_array
microservices.doc:
Prints a numpy array

Args:
    list_ints (list[int]): list of ints to print
microservices.code:
def print_numpy_array(list_ints):
    """Prints a numpy array

    Args:
        list_ints (list[int]): list of ints to print
    """

    print(np.array(list_ints))
